title: My Bed is Now a Movie Theater // Bedroom Projector Build with XGIMI Halo

media:group.media:title: My Bed is Now a Movie Theater // Bedroom Projector Build with XGIMI Halo
media:group.media:description:
Some dreams start small, others start with a 6 foot movie screen at the foot of your bed! This video covers my build of a bed-mounted movie screen and projector mount. Big thanks to XGIMI for sending me their Halo portable projector!

𝐒𝐡𝐨𝐩𝐩𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐋𝐢𝐬𝐭*

• XGIMI Halo Portable Projector : https://amzn.to/3O9N5b2
• Sovol SV01 Pro : https://amzn.to/3PnaTZP
• Video Projector Screen 100" : https://amzn.to/3yzKzVz
• Dremel Laser Measurement Tool : https://amzn.to/3IztLTh
• Sanding Sponge Set : https://amzn.to/3RtR8S5
• Irwin Quick-Grip Bar Clamps : https://amzn.to/3PpQPWz
• Aluminum Push Pins 5/8" Point : https://amzn.to/3uK84Kt
• Fillamentum 'UFO Blue Metallic' CPE Filament : https://bit.ly/UFOblu
• Qidi X-CF Pro 3D Printer : https://amzn.to/3RsLK1J
• Qidi PA12-CF Nylon Filament : https://amzn.to/3c30Ydz
